title: Question:
author: aoluain
content: 7 day pollI have taken stock of my gambling over last year and have concluded that I broke even,I have not made any profits but have not had any losses - overall. I wouldn't class myselfas a high roller gambler, I do a lot of microbes, I'm not looking to become a millionairefrom gambling but I do enjoy the buzz if winning  occasionally!Just wondering what state others have experienced over the year, not looking for numbersor any scientific data, just interested in your progress.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: aoluain on January 04, 2023, 08:45:22 AMJust wondering what state others have experienced over the year, not looking for numbersor any scientific data, just interested in your progress.I do not known if I gained than I lost, I use little amount of money for gambling, I do not have to calculate if I win or lost, but I think I have an overall profit.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: Guess I'm at a loss since my winnings can be counted, most of my losses were probably the biggest at slot and next for sports betting though I say I have a good winning percentage compared to luck-based gambling. I will not gamble regularly too this 2023, will focus more on learning new ventures but for sure I'll be tempted once again.

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Quite made some profit during third quarter of last year because of esports betting,to be specific- on TI. Had some lucky guesses which generated profit. But since I've lost somehow of a huge amount on the first quarter, I did not earn that much if I would sum it up but still, I am happy for my gambling result in 2022, hopefully, things would be better for this year. I am planning to engage more with fighting sports 'coz there are many line ups for this year. But ofcourse, I'd be needing to manage the risks and avoid multiple bets I guess to make it a less risky gambling routine.  But in general, 2022 is a good gambling experience and is a better one compared to my 2021 losses.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: Looking at my checking account, all I see is a long streak of $22 weekly withdraws. No unscheduled deposits whatsoever meaning I haven't made any money apart from what I'm making in my job and business. This 2023, I'm trying to make some changes on my gambling habits and focus more in sports betting and slowly leave casino games behind. I like slots and roulette still because they have fancy multipliers and bonuses across the board, but for dice? I think it's time to say goodbye to it.Hopefully 2023 brings a fruitful year to our gambling activities. The first 3 days of gambling brought forth some greens in my initial bankroll. A good opening for the year but it can be better.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: Overall I have made a little profit in 2022, of course I don't always make money, I'm still a human too and predict many fights in wrong. I mostly bet on football because there's a high chance upset can happen rather than the other sports where upset is really hard to happen and the odds isn't really so high. However my betting result isn't always make profit, maybe this year I will suffer losses since luck isn't always happen lol.

comments.author: btc_angela
comments.body: As I have check my bets in several sports bookies, I will say it's "or have just broke even?", and because there are times that I also go to traditional base casinos so I say that I might have been break even for last year 2022.And it's probably a good reminding for this year, specially going out and see and write down our budget and if ever we won? Although I'm not going to be surprised if there are gamblers not really jotting everything down in paper and look if they are plus or minus in this gambling activity.

comments.author: jrrsparkles
comments.body: Looking at my overall betting chart then I can say I am in profits not really in huge amount but stats says I won more than loss so in net I made profits. About the year 2022 in particular I don't really know because just like you I am a casual gambler and doing it for fun only so I haven't made any bet and regret about that so keep enjoying don't go beyond your limits.

comments.author: traderethereum
comments.body: Actually, I have never counted the number of wins and losses in gambling, but I feel that my losses are greater than the number of wins, even though I have withdrawn some of the winning money.I'm a small gambler who also never spends more than $100 but yesterday's World Cup event made me deposit more money than usual damn But if there are no special events, I usually deposit under $50, maybe under $30 a month and it usually stays in my account for more than a month.But that's gambling. It can give us wins and losses on the same day.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: almost on average in 2022 yesterday I suffered a big loss in a world cup match because there were many matches that were out of my head and many teams that were not favored won in those matches, quite a lot of defeats there, almost all of the profits I got because betting on the league ended in the world cup event

comments.author: klidex
comments.body: Quote from: traderethereum on January 04, 2023, 10:09:43 AMActually, I have never counted the number of wins and losses in gambling, but I feel that my losses are greater than the number of wins, even though I have withdrawn some of the winning money.I'm a small gambler who also never spends more than $100 but yesterday's World Cup event made me deposit more money than usual damn But if there are no special events, I usually deposit under $50, maybe under $30 a month and it usually stays in my account for more than a month.But that's gambling. It can give us wins and losses on the same day.If you gamble or bet just for fun, then don't think about losses or gains.Because basically you can only win or win if luck is on your side, especially if you only use a relatively small amount of money.From my personal experience, playing with more capital can also provide greater profit opportunities. However, everything must have the right strategy and analysis calculations and the method of placing and the amount of bets is also very influential.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: rhomelmabini on January 04, 2023, 09:07:00 AMI will not gamble regularly too this 2023, will focus more on learning new ventures but for sure I'll be tempted once again.In anything that you are doing, you have to discipline yourself just as is in gambling, discipline is needed. I see frequent gambling as indiscipline, just gamble little and have the best fun you can have at that moment. It is better to focus yourself on other things that can help you. I too gamble but not frequently. Quote from: piebeyb on January 04, 2023, 11:40:05 AMalmost on average in 2022 yesterday I suffered a big loss in a world cup match because there were many matches that were out of my head and many teams that were not favored won in those matches, quite a lot of defeats there, almost all of the profits I got because betting on the league ended in the world cup event  I like sport too, I focus myself more on club matches than national leagues and the result is better. Especially in this last world cup, many unexpected events occurred as the team we thought would win did not win.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on January 04, 2023, 01:10:03 PMQuote from: rhomelmabini on January 04, 2023, 09:07:00 AMI will not gamble regularly too this 2023, will focus more on learning new ventures but for sure I'll be tempted once again.In anything that you are doing, you have to discipline yourself just as is in gambling, discipline is needed. I see frequent gambling as indiscipline, just gamble little and have the best fun you can have at that moment. It is better to focus yourself on other things that can help you. I too gamble but not frequently. Not that I always do but I'm reminding and having second thoughts above anything else, that way I can tell if "I should do this or instead do this one". I'm not gambling huge amount of money in the first place and I'm proud to say I'm a responsible gambler, online gambling is too tempting and if you're not that careful you could end up losing it all.

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: aoluain on January 04, 2023, 08:45:22 AM7 day pollI have taken stock of my gambling over last year and have concluded that I broke even,I have not made any profits but have not had any losses - overall. I wouldn't class myselfas a high roller gambler, I do a lot of microbes, I'm not looking to become a millionairefrom gambling but I do enjoy the buzz if winning  occasionally!I am always thrilled when I see people that are good in record keeping. But keeping record of bets, gains and losses is going the extreme. I really commend the OP for such an uncommon skill.QuoteJust wondering what state others have experienced over the year, not looking for numbersor any scientific data, just interested in your progress.I have not been keeping records of my wins and losses regarding gambling. I just spend the money I win or immediately forget about what was lost. But I think it is very important to have such records because even if you don't see gambling as a business, its good know if you gained or lost a the end of the month/year. This year I have decided to record all my gambling activities. The polls would have included option for "No record or Don't know"

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: I believe this should be an individual gamblers decision to choose the right thing applicable to his own case because one does not really need to always win whenever he gambles before he can assume to make profit from it as long as there's this satisfaction a gambler derived even when loosing but such get fulfilled because the pleasure is satisfactory enough, this kind of gamblers doesn't mind even While they loose, those that directly depends on gambling for a living may not accept this kind of lifestyle and will thereby count it a loss than having fun whenever they are loosing, as for me it's a brake even because I'd never regretted any loss even when am loosing.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: aoluain on January 04, 2023, 08:45:22 AMJust wondering what state others have experienced over the year, not looking for numbersor any scientific data, just interested in your progress.In 2022 I haven't won many wins in online crypto gambling as a whole, it's different from in 2020 at that time, I won more wins and results in online betting betting.In 2022, I gambled with no profit and no loss (draw) lose and win, besides that I'm in 22 I don't focus on other types of gambling, I tend to bet more on the sports section, maybe more football, the occasional basketball and boxing.Because the situation for the football team in yesterday's world cup was a little messy based on predictions, of course the team we bet on lost a lot, even though I bet on winning but that can only cover defeat for other bets, so in 2022 I don't make a lot of bets, only 40% to bet, maybe if there is a good opportunity in 2023, I will achieve good results, hopefully.

comments.author: GiftedMAN
comments.body: Quote from: aoluain on January 04, 2023, 08:45:22 AMJust wondering what state others have experienced over the year, not looking for numbersor any scientific data, just interested in your progress.Not that I kept the total record of my bet last year but based on the amount I budgeted on gambling which did not bring out a good return, in overall it was a big loss for me because my losses were greater than my profit. Though this experience I had in gambling last year made me understand that there is no sure game in gambling regardless of the odds of the game and the players involved it is only a game of luck and chance.

comments.author: Genemind
comments.body: I somehow controlled my urge to gamble this 2022, so I guess I am close to breaking even and won some money this 2022. This year had been great since most of the time I'm busy with my new family and the new job, I wasn't able to spend some time in this forum and gambling. I just hope this year will be productive to all of us, more winnings to those who will gamble more and more opportunities. Happy New Year everyone!

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on January 04, 2023, 01:10:03 PMQuote from: piebeyb on January 04, 2023, 11:40:05 AMalmost on average in 2022 yesterday I suffered a big loss in a world cup match because there were many matches that were out of my head and many teams that were not favored won in those matches, quite a lot of defeats there, almost all of the profits I got because betting on the league ended in the world cup event  I like sport too, I focus myself more on club matches than national leagues and the result is better. Especially in this last world cup, many unexpected events occurred as the team we thought would win did not win.yes my winnings and profits while betting on the league in 2022 yesterday ended in the world cup match yesterday, but that made me learn to stay focused on the league and not to play in the national league anymore, at least in 2023 I will recover my defeat in last year after picking up a slight advantage from a few games earlier this year

comments.author: fennic
comments.body: Quote from: aoluain on January 04, 2023, 08:45:22 AM7 day pollI have taken stock of my gambling over last year and have concluded that I broke even,I have not made any profits but have not had any losses - overall. I wouldn't class myselfas a high roller gambler, I do a lot of microbes, I'm not looking to become a millionairefrom gambling but I do enjoy the buzz if winning  occasionally!Just wondering what state others have experienced over the year, not looking for numbersor any scientific data, just interested in your progress.As for as I am concerned I have not gambled in 2022 because I was focused on some other things. And also I have gotten heavy loss in 2017 and that was quite nightmare for me cause I was student back than and I was saving money. And I have learnt a lot of new things in this Market. I am hoping to find something good and also interesting to make some good money too. let's see what will happen in this 2023 year.
